subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his first competition in seven months, the 7-foot freshman Greg Oden, called by some the best United States-born big man in a generation, had 14 points and 10 rebounds to lead No. 3 Ohio State past visiting Valparaiso yesterday, 78-58.
